key.name: auto-indent
key.description: When true auto-indentation is enabled, when false it is not.

key.name: font-name
key.description: The name of the font to use in the textviews. Can contain Pango font description syntax for greater control.

key.name: use-default-monospace-font
key.description: When enabled, rather than using the font specified in the 'font-name' setting, the default fixed-width font will be used (ie. the font name 'Monospace').

key.name: show-whitespace
key.description: When true whitespace will be visualized in the view. See also 'view-show-line-endings'.

key.name: show-line-endings
key.description: When true newlines will be visualized in the view. See also 'view-show-whitespace'.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: When true visually indicate the line with the caret on it, when false provide no such indication.

key.name: indent-on-tab
key.description: When true indent selected text when tab key is pressed, when false, don't indent on tab.

key.name: indent-width
key.description: Width of an indentation step expressed in number of spaces.

key.name: insert-spaces
key.description: When true spaces will be insert when the Tab key is pressed instead of tab characters, when false tab characters will be inserted.

key.name: right-margin-position
key.description: Position of the right margin (line drawn vertically down right side of the view).

key.name: show-line-marks
key.description: Whether to display line mark pixbufs.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: When true the line numbers gutter/margin will be visible, when false it will not be visible.

key.name: show-right-margin
key.description: When true the right margin is displayed at the column specified in 'view-right-margin-position', when false it is not drawn.

key.name: smart-home-end
key.description: Sets the behaviour of the HOME and END keys.

key.name: tab-width
key.description: The number of characters wide that a tab character appears as.

key.name: word-wrap
key.description: When true long lines will be virtually wrapped in order to fit within the text view, when false long lines will extend out of view.

key.name: match-braces
key.description: When true highlight matching braces, brackets, parents, etc, when false don't highlight them.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Name of the color scheme to use to highlight syntax or 'none' for no syntax highlighting.

key.name: toolbar-style
key.description: Controls how the toolbar items will be drawn with respect to text labels and icons (if visible).

key.name: toolbar-icon-size
key.description: Controls the size of the toolbar icons (if visible).

key.name: always-show-tabs
key.description: When true the main document notebook will always show its tabs, when false the tabs will be hidden when there is only one document open.

key.name: cycle-tabs
key.description: When true and cycling through tabs, wrap around once the last tab is reached, when false do nothing at the last tab.

key.name: default-tab-sizes
key.description: A comma-separated string listing the tab sizes that are show in the user-interface for selecting tab width.

key.name: path-in-title
key.description: When true the active document's full path will be shown in the window's titlebar, when false only the basename will be shown.

key.name: recent-menu-items
key.description: The number of recent documents to track and show in the user interace.

key.name: remember-size
key.description: When true the size of the window will be saved and restored.

key.name: remember-position
key.description: When true will attempt to save and restore the position of the window when false it won't. Note that window placement is supposed to be the job of the Window Manager and that there's no guarantee the restored window position will be respected, accurate, or even visible on any screen.

key.name: remember-state
key.description: When true will attempt to save and restore the windows state (ex. normal, maximized, fullscreen, etc, when false it will not. Your Window Manager may very well not report when retrieving or not respect it when setting.

key.name: menubar-visible
key.description: When true the main menubar is visible, when false it is not visible.

key.name: toolbar-visible
key.description: When true the toolbar is visible, when false it is not visible.

key.name: statusbar-visible
key.description: When true the statusbar is visible, when false it is not visible.

key.name: menubar-visible-in-fullscreen
key.description: A value of 'auto' means follow the main menubar-visible setting, 'no' means the menubar is not visible in fullscreen, and 'yes' means that it is always visible in fullscreen.

key.name: toolbar-visible-in-fullscreen
key.description: A value of 'auto' means follow the main toolbar-visible setting, 'no' means the toolbar is not visible in fullscreen, and 'yes' means that it is always visible in fullscreen.

key.name: statusbar-visible-in-fullscreen
key.description: A value of 'auto' means follow the main statusbar-visible setting, 'no' means the statusbar is not visible in fullscreen, and 'yes' means that it is always visible in fullscreen.

key.name: direction
key.description: When 0 the search direction is backwards/upwards, when 1 the search direction is forwards/downwards, when 2 the search will wrap around.

key.name: match-case
key.description: When true searches will be case-sensitive, when false they will be case-insensitive.

key.name: match-whole-word
key.description: When true searches must match an entire word (using default word boundary characters), when false matches can occur anywhere, even within a larger word.

key.name: replace-all
key.description: When true the Replace search dialog is in "replace-all" mode, when false the dialog is in "replace-one-at-a-time" mode.

key.name: replace-all-location
key.description: When 0 the replace-all is performed within the current selection, when 1 the replace-all is performed in the current document, and when 2 the replace-all is performed in all currently open documents.

key.name: height
key.description: The height of window in pixels.

key.name: width
key.description: The width of windows in pixels.

key.name: top
key.description: The Y coordinate of the window's position

key.name: left
key.description: The X coordinate of the window's position

key.name: maximized
key.description: Whether the window is maximized or not.

key.name: fullscreen
key.description: When true the window will be fullscreen, when false it won't be.
